title: Getting Started with the AddBlockButton Component
description: This guide helps you set up and use the AddBlockButton component for adding different types of blocks in a user-friendly interface.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: The AddBlockButton component allows users to add various types of content blocks, such as text, images, and lists, to enhance the interactivity of your application.
Follow these steps to install and set up the AddBlockButton component in your project.
To use the AddBlockButton component, import it into your desired file and include it in your JSX.
The AddBlockButton component is a powerful tool for enhancing user interaction in your application. By following this guide, you can easily implement it and start adding blocks.
Remember to check the component's documentation for advanced features and customization options.
